ValidationRule.description: The Customer Organisation should not be allowed to select for Non Verizon Quotes.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", $RecordType.DeveloperName='Contracted_Quote', NOT( CQ_eQuote__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( CQ_Customer_Organization_Segment__c , '')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer Organization Segment selection is ONLY applicable for Verizon Wireless Quotes
